song_lyrics: Shāmaḷīyo sanehī bāī mune prāṇthī pyāro,
Ghadīye na melu vhālājīne nayanthī nyāro...
Tan man dhan mārū vahālājīne kāje,
Have nathī bītī durijan lokḍānī lāje... 1
Vahālājī sangāthe bāī mārū chittḍu bandhāṇu,
Have ā sansārīyā re truṇ jevā jāṇu... 2
Melyo re sansār me to Harivar māṭe,
Vahālojī varī chhu bāī mārā shirne sāṭe... 3
Bhale re maḷyā mune Harivar āvī,
title: Shāmaḷīyo sanehī bāī mune prāṇthī pyāro

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-82: Sadguru Premanand Swami

Category: Shri Harina Pad
